title: ASL Starter Kit Bonus Pack #1 - Beyond the Beaches
description:
Advanced Squad Leader: Starter Kit Bonus Pack #1 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Beyond the Beaches

ASL Starter Kit Bonus Pack #1 is a small scenario bundle (three scenarios) and one map all specifically designed for use with the ASL Starter Kit #1.

ASL Starter Kit Bonus Pack #1 contains:
- 1 ASL/ASLSK geomorphic mapboard (board p)
- 3 new ASLSK scenarios

Scenarios:
- S41 Sink's Encouragement - 5 turns, board p, 8 June 1944, St. Come du Mont, France
- S42 One More Hedgerow - 5.5 turns, board p, 13 June 1944, Couvains, France
- S43 Clearing Carentan - 6 turns, board z, 12 June 1944, Carentan France
